case: The service is transparent regarding government requests or inquiries that may involve your data.
quoteText:
we will not share your information without consent to a third party outside our organization except for the following reason. We may share the information collected with an external entity if we have a good-faith belief that access, use, preservation or disclosure of the information is reasonably necessary to:

  • Meet any applicable law, regulation, legal process or enforceable governmental request.

case: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

Your personal data is not sold
quoteText:
Information Sale or Sharing

Any information we have about you will never be sold or rented to others, God willing (i.e., it is for internal use)

case: You can opt out of promotional communications
quoteText: You may opt out of any future contacts from us at any time

case: Only temporary session cookies are used
quoteText: We do not use cookies except for some dynamic content, and for which only session cookies are used.</

case: Third-party cookies are used for statistics
quoteText: Some activity on this website is tracked using tracking code (Google analytics) for optimization purposes (goal is to understand what users like to read and to thereby, God willing, improve the user experience).

case: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data
quoteText:
You are also welcome to:

  • Access, change/correct any data we have about you
  • Have us delete any data we have about you.
